sourcesContent:
// ✅ AccessibilityFAB.jsx
import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Fab,
  Paper,
  Button,
  Typography,
  Collapse,
  Grid,
  IconButton
} from '@mui/material';
import AccessibilityNewIcon from '@mui/icons-material/AccessibilityNew';
import ContrastIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Tonality';
import PsychologyIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Psychology';
import TextFieldsIcon from '@mui/icons-material/TextFields';
import AnimationIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MotionPhotosOff';
import ImageIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Image';
import LinkIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Link';
import MouseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Mouse';
import InvertColorsIcon from '@mui/icons-material/InvertColors';
import FormatLineSpacingIcon from '@mui/icons-material/FormatLineSpacing';
import { AccessibilityContext } from '../../context/AccessibilityContext';

const fasesVisuales = (nivel, setNivel, niveles) => (
  <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', gap: 0.5, mt: 1 }}>
    {niveles.map((n) => (
      <IconButton
        key={n}
        size="small"
        sx={{
          width: 20,
          height: 6,
          borderRadius: 2,
          backgroundColor: nivel === n ? '#1976d2' : '#ccc'
        }}
        onClick={() => setNivel(n)}
      />
    ))}
  </Box>
);

export default function AccessibilityFAB() {
  const [open, setOpen] = useState(false);
  const {
    altoContraste,
    modoDislexia,
    tamañoTexto,
    aumentarTexto,
    disminuirTexto,
    ocultarImágenes,
    resaltarEnlaces,
    detenerAnimaciones,
    modoLupa,
    espaciadoNivel,
    alturaLinea,
    invertirColores,
    setEspaciadoNivel,
    setAlturaLinea,
    toggleContraste,
    toggleDislexia,
    toggleOcultarImágenes,
    toggleResaltarEnlaces,
    toggleAnimaciones,
    toggleModoLupa,
    toggleInvertirColores
  } = useContext(AccessibilityContext);

  const tarjetaStyle = (activo) => ({
    p: 2,
    backgroundColor: activo ? '#e3f2fd' : '#f3f6f9',
    borderRadius: 3,
    border: `2px solid ${activo ? '#1976d2' : '#d0d7de'}`,
    textAlign: 'center',
    transition: 'all 0.3s ease-in-out'
  });

  return (
    <Box
      sx={{
        position: 'fixed',
        bottom: 16,
        right: 16,
        zIndex: 1300
      }}
    >
      <Collapse in={open}>
        <Paper
          sx={{
            p: 3,
            mb: 2,
            maxWidth: 400,
            maxHeight: '75vh',
            overflowY: 'auto',
            borderRadius: 3
          }}
        >
          <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>Opciones de accesibilidad</Typography>
          <Grid container spacing={2}>
            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle(altoContraste)}>
                <ContrastIcon />
                <Typography>Contraste</Typography>
                <Button size="small" onClick={toggleContraste}>{altoContraste ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}</Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle(modoDislexia)}>
                <PsychologyIcon />
                <Typography>Dislexia</Typography>
                <Button size="small" onClick={toggleDislexia}>{modoDislexia ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}</Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle(invertirColores)}>
                <InvertColorsIcon />
                <Typography>Invertir</Typography>
                <Button size="small" onClick={toggleInvertirColores}>{invertirColores ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}</Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle(true)}>
                <TextFieldsIcon />
                <Typography>Agrandar texto</Typography>
                <Box display="flex" gap={1} justifyContent="center">
                  <Button size="small" onClick={disminuirTexto}>-</Button>
                  <Typography>{Math.round(tamañoTexto * 100)}%</Typography>
                  <Button size="small" onClick={aumentarTexto}>+</Button>
                </Box>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle(true)}>
                <FormatLineSpacingIcon />
                <Typography>Espaciado</Typography>
                {fasesVisuales(espaciadoNivel, setEspaciadoNivel, ['normal', 'medio', 'alto'])}
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle(true)}>
                <FormatLineSpacingIcon />
                <Typography>Altura de línea</Typography>
                {fasesVisuales(alturaLinea, setAlturaLinea, ['normal', 'medio', 'alto'])}
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle(ocultarImágenes)}>
                <ImageIcon />
                <Typography>Ocultar imágenes</Typography>
                <Button size="small" onClick={toggleOcultarImágenes}>{ocultarImágenes ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}</Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle(resaltarEnlaces)}>
                <LinkIcon />
                <Typography>Resaltar enlaces</Typography>
                <Button size="small" onClick={toggleResaltarEnlaces}>{resaltarEnlaces ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}</Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle(detenerAnimaciones)}>
                <AnimationIcon />
                <Typography>Animaciones</Typography>
                <Button size="small" onClick={toggleAnimaciones}>{detenerAnimaciones ? 'Desactivar' : 'Detener'}</Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle(modoLupa)}>
                <MouseIcon />
                <Typography>Lupa</Typography>
                <Button size="small" onClick={toggleModoLupa}>{modoLupa ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}</Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Paper>
      </Collapse>

      <Fab onClick={() => setOpen(prev => !prev)} color="primary">
        <AccessibilityNewIcon />
      </Fab>
    </Box>
  );
}
